org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter

Class NetDatacenterBroker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.NetDatacenterBroker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class NetDatacenterBroker
extends SimEntity
    NetDatacentreBroker represents a broker acting on behalf of Datacenter provider. It hides VM management, as vm creation, submission of cloudlets to this VMs and destruction of VMs. NOTE- It is an example only. It work on behalf of a provider not for users. One has to implement interaction with user broker to this broker.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 3.0
    Author:
    Saurabh Kumar Garg
